org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal

类 Kafka09Fetcher<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals.AbstractFetcher<T,org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internal.Kafka09Fetcher<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - The type of elements produced by the fetcher.
    直接已知子类:
    Kafka010Fetcher

    public class Kafka09Fetcher<T>
extends AbstractFetcher<T,org.apache.kafka.common.TopicPartition>
    A fetcher that fetches data from Kafka brokers via the Kafka 0.9 consumer API.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private KafkaConsumerThread consumerThread
      The thread that runs the actual KafkaConsumer and hand the record batches to this fetcher.
      private KeyedDeserializationSchema<T> deserializer
      The schema to convert between Kafka's byte messages, and Flink's objects.
      private Handover handover
      The handover of data and exceptions between the consumer thread and the task thread.
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private boolean running
      Flag to mark the main work loop as alive.

      • 从类继承的字段 org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.internals.AbstractFetcher
